bio: Over twenty years of experience as a Patent Attorney handling U.S. and foreign patent prosecution in the fields of electronic, electrical, optical, computer, and mechanical arts, with related patent searching and infringement opinions. In addition, over fourteen years of progressive engineering experience in the proposal, development, and fabrication of military, commercial, and space Flight Vehicle Systems. This includes technical competence in machining and fabrication processes, mechanical design and analysis, radar system operation and testing, design and fabrication of electronic and microwave systems, and communication networks. Educational background includes graduate Electrical Engineering and Physics courses. This enables me to prepare Patent Applications in advanced technical fields that present a challenge to most patent practitioners. Representative arts worked include: Analog and Digital Electronics, Fiber Optics, Photonics, Laser Systems, Optics, MRI, Image Processing
Fixed price projects preferred.

abstrac: Web and Mobile Application Development Company
bio:
Webgen Technologies  (W.G. Technologies Pvt Ltd) is a one-stop shop for all your web presence needs. Our primary focus is on harnessing the power of the web using opensource tools. We are a company that you can not only contract but also consult. We help you to choose the right solution at the right price which is absolutely specific to your business needs with ample room for scalability and future upgrades. We would provide an SEO friendly design which would be compliant with w3c standards and also user friendly.

Following is our area of expertise:

Development Services:

*CMS solutions (Joomla, Wordpress, Drupal, Custom CMS)
*e-commerce solutions (Magento, woocommerce, WP ecommerce, Opencart)
*Mobile Application Development (Android, iOS, Ionic, Phonegap)
*ERP & CRM: vTiger and SugarCRM interation and customization
*Frameworks used: CodeIgnitor, Zend, CakePHP, Symfony2 and Yii

Design Services:

*Website Design/Re-design (Tableless and Responsive)
*Logo Design
*Corporate Stationary & Merchandise
*Corporate Brochures
*Newsletter Creation

We will provide 6 months of supports for any bugs or errors caused from our side which may have not been detected during the UAT stage. Any additional work would be chargeable at the rate of $15/hr for design and $20/hr for programming

Warranty:
6 month warranty from date of go-live.

Other Terms

• Time taken for client feedback has not been taken into consideration for projecting the delivery timeline.
• Payment will be through Guru Escrow
• Source codes will be released after realizing the final payment.
• Proposal Validity is 30 days from the date of issue.
• Additional design and development (requirements that aren’t listed in the scope of the work) will be entertained on an hourly basis for which our hourly charges will be applicable.

bio:
With more than 1000+ website and 12 years experience in the field of web development, I have worked on site of different statures, including simple HTML websites to complex CRM's. I am experienced in coding with all open source applications including Wordpress, Oscommerce, Joomla, Drupal, Opencart, Magento and various others.

I believe in understanding the client requirements and then offering them viable solutions that work and are secure. You can always leverage my years long experience in handling different types of web projects to launch your start up, find viable solutions to your marketing, logistics and selling needs.

Work Timing from 8:00 AM Indian Standard Time to 12 Midnight Indian Standard Time from Monday To Friday. Indian Standard Time is +5:30 GMT.

10% advance
70% broken up into milestones during the development of the project.
20% on successful completion.
